name: Lazare Picault View
description: The wide sea vista spreads below Lazare Picault viewpoint as sunset creates a glowing haze over the waters where the great explorer first charted these islands. Pirate and witch stand together beneath the large compass ring etched in stone, while a skull guards the cutlass sheathed at the pirate's side. The sun sits precisely at the 255-degree mark, and tiny letters 'LP' are etched nearby—initials that name the man this ridge remembers. Bearing 255°. Cipher output: CA. "Name the man the ridge remembers."
riddle: Name the man the ridge remembers.
